# redfox_crds (Data Source)

List Crd
```terraform
data "redfox_crds" "all" {
}

data "redfox_crds" "key-equals" {
  label_selectors = {
    "my-label"  = ""
    "my-label2" = ""
  }
}

data "redfox_crds" "key-value-equals" {
  label_selectors = {
    "my-label" = "bar-value"
  }
}
```
